blocks.name: hero_description
blocks.value: Join a community of cloud enthusiasts across Indonesia and shape the nation's cloud future!

blocks.name: who_are_we_description
blocks.value:
iCCom (Indonesia Cloud Community) is a welcoming space for anyone who's passionate about cloud technology and its development.

We're a nonprofit community dedicated to growing cloud talent and expertise across Indonesia through shared learning and support.

Whether you're just getting started or already experienced, if cloud tech excites you, you'll fit right in.

blocks.name: iccom_core_value_loop
blocks.value: [{"core_title":"Embrace Learning","core_description":"People learn together, trade ideas, back each other up, and grow side by side.","core_icon":"media\/embrace-learning-icon-with-white-bg-1770307229-xKUGYXoH.webp"},{"core_title":"Nurture Growth","core_description":"Everyone keeps improving at their own pace while helping the community rise with them.","core_icon":"media\/nurture-growth-icon-with-white-bg-1770307208-f6jSXfv9.webp"},{"core_title":"Strategic Alliance","core_description":"Friendships and collaborations form naturally here, creating opportunities everyone can be part of.","core_icon":"media\/strategic-alliance-icon-with-white-bg-1770307049-egWQAgEg.webp"}]

blocks.name: counter_title
blocks.value: Have Joined to Be a Part of iCCom

blocks.name: talent_referral_description
blocks.value:
At iCCom, we grow by learning together, trying out new tech, building portfolios, and sharing experiences that help us get closer to our goals.

Now you can take your growth to the next level by joining the iCCom Talent Referral Pool and connecting with partner companies that value your skills, passion, and story.
